rows.label: bf06190100_0010
rows.name: Hey, which do you like better, Homura or Hikari?

rows.label: bf06190100_0020
rows.name:
Zeke?
W-what's with that all of a sudden?

rows.label: bf06190100_0030
rows.name:
Anyway, they're the same person! I've never
really thought of them separately...

rows.label: bf06190100_0040
rows.name:
Really? I think their personalities 
are completely different though.

rows.label: bf06190100_0050
rows.name: Hikari is pretty intense, right?

rows.label: bf06190100_0060
rows.name:
On the other hand, Homura is quiet or rather
less assertive, you could say.

rows.label: bf06190100_0070
rows.name: That's how it looks from the outside.

rows.label: bf06190100_0080
rows.name:
But Homura's got a lot of backbone too.
She's quite competitive too.

rows.label: bf06190100_0090
rows.name: You seem to understand them pretty deeply.

rows.label: bf06190100_0100
rows.name: Hah... I suppose that's how it is.

rows.label: bf06190100_0110
rows.name: Hey...

rows.label: bf06190100_0120
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: bf06190100_0130
rows.name: Zeke, you're a prince of Luxuria, right?

rows.label: bf06190100_0140
rows.name: Why were you at the Holy See?

rows.label: bf06190100_0150
rows.name: I mean, you can't just ask someone...

rows.label: bf06190100_0160
rows.name: ...He was just kicked out of his home.

rows.label: bf06190100_0170
rows.name: Y-you idiot! What the hell are you talking about?

rows.label: bf06190100_0180
rows.name: Anyway, since when were you standing there?

rows.label: bf06190100_0190
rows.name: "Which do you like better?"...

rows.label: bf06190100_0200
rows.name:
"Which do you like better?"...
That's from the very beginning!

rows.label: bf06190100_0210
rows.name: The prince was disowned by the king.

rows.label: bf06190100_0220
rows.name:
Because he kept leaving the country without studying
And just fooling around all the time.

rows.label: bf06190100_0230
rows.name: That's only natural.

rows.label: bf06190100_0240
rows.name:
Ah, I wasn't just playing around
It was social studies, traveling to gain knowledge.

rows.label: bf06190100_0250
rows.name:
"Traveling to gain knowledge" 
is just playing around.

rows.label: bf06190100_0260
rows.name:
You idiot! 
I mean, why are you dissing your own Driver?

rows.label: bf06190100_0270
rows.name: You guys are funny, Zeke and all.

rows.label: bf06190100_0280
rows.name: We make a good pair, don't we?

rows.label: bf06190100_0290
rows.name:
Yep.
Anyway, he sounds tough. Zeke's father, I mean.

rows.label: bf06190100_0300
rows.name: Luxuria is an isolationist society...

rows.label: bf06190100_0310
rows.name:
Crossing its borders without leave
is strictly forbidden.

rows.label: bf06190100_0320
rows.name: It's been that way for a very long time.

rows.label: bf06190100_0330
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: bf06190100_0340
rows.name: But you've seen how my Prince here is.

rows.label: bf06190100_0350
rows.name:
He went outside many times without permission
And after getting severely scolded, he was disowned.

rows.label: bf06190100_0360
rows.name: That was when he was 15, right?

rows.label: bf06190100_0370
rows.name: Around that age, yeah.

rows.label: bf06190100_0380
rows.name:
And then when he was found collapsed 
on the road The Pope picked him up.

rows.label: bf06190100_0390
rows.name: That "special envoy" thing, that's a lie.

rows.label: bf06190100_0400
rows.name: And that's how you ended up in Acedia...

rows.label: bf06190100_0405
rows.name: It all makes sense now.

rows.label: bf06190100_0410
rows.name:
But hey.
Is it okay for you, to return to your country?

rows.label: bf06190100_0420
rows.name:
This time we have the Holy See's official justification,
so it should probably be fine

rows.label: bf06190100_0430
rows.name: Besides...

rows.label: bf06190100_0440
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ï¼Ÿ

rows.label: bf06190100_0450
rows.name:
Luxuria knows too little about the outside world.
Things can't continue like this...

rows.label: bf06190100_0460
rows.name:
Your Highness, we have reached the 
designated coordinates. Please prepare.

rows.label: bf06190100_0470
rows.name: Oh, Saika.

rows.label: bf06190100_0480
rows.name: Leave it to me!

rows.label: bf06190100_0490
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf06190100_0500
rows.name:
It's fine, just watch quietly and
don't get scared.
